Class Graph

java.lang.Object
Graph
Type Parameters:
Town - the type of vertices in the graph
Road - the type of edges in the graph
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphInterface<Town,Road>
public class Graph extends Object implements GraphInterface<Town,Road>
Implementation of a Graph using an adjacency list. This graph represents vertices as Town objects and edges as Road objects.
